#include<stdio.h>
//Sieve-of-Eratosthenes Prime Number Algorithm
int main()
{
int n,i,j,m,t,count;
int prime[1000000];
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
	count=0;
scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);

for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
prime[i]=1;
for(i=2;i*i<=n;i++)
{
	if(prime[i]==1)
	{
		for(j=i*2;j<=n;j=j+i)
			prime[j]=0;
	}
}
for(i=m;i<=n;i++)
	if(prime[i] &&i!=1)
	{
		//printf("%d\n",i);
		count++;
	}
printf("%d\n",count);

}
return 0;
}
